Text: Much Better then the orginal!  Thanks for the Upload ChingLiu.

Thanks for the upload :)  

The install works fine, and Photoshop picks up HDR Efex Pro 2 - but Adobe Bridge doesn't pick it up, even though the installer offered to link with Bridge.  I've started a thread on Suprbay to see if anyone knows how to make the linking work.
Works perfectly for me too.  Good job! :)
